object.name: WriteAccessAllowed
object.description: This object represents a service message about a user allowing a bot to write messages after adding it to the attachment menu, launching a Web App from a link, or accepting an explicit request from a Web App sent by the method requestWriteAccess.
object.html_description: This object represents a service message about a user allowing a bot to write messages after adding it to the attachment menu, launching a Web App from a link, or accepting an explicit request from a Web App sent by the method requestWriteAccess.
object.rst_description: This object represents a service message about a user allowing a bot to write messages after adding it to the attachment menu, launching a Web App from a link, or accepting an explicit request from a Web App sent by the method `requestWriteAccess <https://core.telegram.org/bots/webapps#initializing-mini-apps>`_.

annotations.description: True, if the access was granted after the user accepted an explicit request from a Web App sent by the method requestWriteAccess
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the access was granted after the user accepted an explicit request from a Web App sent by the method requestWriteAccess
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the access was granted after the user accepted an explicit request from a Web App sent by the method `requestWriteAccess <https://core.telegram.org/bots/webapps#initializing-mini-apps>`_
annotations.name: from_request

annotations.description: Name of the Web App, if the access was granted when the Web App was launched from a link
annotations.html_description: Optional. Name of the Web App, if the access was granted when the Web App was launched from a link
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Name of the Web App, if the access was granted when the Web App was launched from a link
annotations.name: web_app_name

annotations.description: True, if the access was granted when the bot was added to the attachment or side menu
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the access was granted when the bot was added to the attachment or side menu
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the access was granted when the bot was added to the attachment or side menu
annotations.name: from_attachment_menu
